ROW.PDT: *IF ( ( *VALUE KLZ_Disk.Mount_Point *NE '/cdrom' *AND *VALUE KLZ_Disk.Mount_Point *NE '/boot' *AND *VALUE KLZ_Disk.Mount_Point *NE '/gdrpt' *AND *VALUE KLZ_Disk.Mount_Point *NE '/core' *AND *VALUE KLZ_Disk.Disk_Used_Percent *GE 85 ) *OR ( *VALUE KLZ_Disk.Mount_Point *EQ '/boot' *AND *VALUE KLZ_Disk.Disk_Used_Percent *GE 95 ) *OR ( *VALUE KLZ_Disk.Mount_Point *EQ '/core' *AND *VALUE KLZ_Disk.Disk_Used_Percent *GE 90 ) *OR ( *VALUE KLZ_Disk.Mount_Point *EQ '/gdrpt' *AND *VALUE KLZ_Disk.Disk_Used_Percent *GE 90 ) )
ROW.TEXT: 已用磁盘百分比大于等于85%;7*24;1
